item.title: India’s Leading EV Charging Networks (2025): Complete Guide to Stations, Apps, Franchise Models & Growth Plans
item.description: As India accelerates towards a future powered by electric mobility, charging infrastructure is becoming just as important as the electric vehicles themselves. It’s no longer just about who makes the best EV—it’s about who helps keep it charged and running.

item.title: Ather Grid – India’s Fastest Growing EV Charging Network for 2-Wheelers
item.description: When we think about electric vehicles (EVs) in India, Ather Energy is one of the first names that comes to mind. From launching some of the smartest electric scooters to setting up a city-wide charging network called Ather Grid, this Bengaluru-based company has been a true pioneer.
